name: Codenovo Portfolio
author: codenovo

sections.description:
Codenovo portfolio is used for showing your projects/works/portfolio in an awesome way. They can be arranged in a nice gallery format with jquery filters. Every portfolio can be categorized. You can easily put title, description and other information. All portfolios are filterable. You can find some similar plugin with filter option, but this plugin is handier than others. Comfortable to use, easy to navigate and very simple to build.

Please check the Demo for real understanding.

The unique part of this plugin is a widget. Codenovo plugin offers a portfolio widget as well. You can showcase your portfolio in anywhere through this widget. You can showcase your top portfolio or any portfolio you choose or even ALL.

Features

  1. Easy to customize
  2. Smooth filtration with jQuery.
  3. All information can be put like Portfolio title, description, project name, project live URL.
  4. All portfolios can be categorized, even to multiple categories.
  5. Portfolio Widget to showcase your portfolio anywhere you want.
  6. Shortcode for pages/posts editor- [codenovo-portfolio]
  7. PHP code for template file- codenovo_portfolio();

Support & Customizations

If you have any question or if you need any assistance regarding the customization regarding the plugin then feel free to contact us.

If you find any bugs in our plugin, let us know.

Also, don’t forget to rate us! Your valuable feedback will help us to make this plugin more improve.
sections.installation:
Using the WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugin dashboard
  2. Search for ‘Codenovo Portfolio’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugin dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select codenovo-portfolio.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download codenovo-portfolio.zip
  2. Extract the codenovo-portfolio directory to your computer
  3. Upload the waving-portfolio directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
Is it free?

Yes, it is completely free.

How can I add a portfolio?

In the portfolio section click “ADD NEW” and fill out the necessary information and click “PUBLISH”.

How can I add portfolio Image?

In the “ADD NEW” section, there is option to add “Set Featured Image”. Set an image there. This image will be your portfolio image.

For any further question you can contact us.
sections.changelog:
1.2.3

*Update for wordpress new version. JS bug fixed.

1.2.2

  • Portfolio link will open in new tab.

1.2.1

  • Bug Fixes.

1.2.0

  • Introduce new column settings.
  • Category filter navigation on/off.
  • Bug Fixes.

1.1.1

  • Fixed popup error.

1.1

  • Fixed javascript and css which were colliding with some themes.

1.0

  • First released version of the plugin.

short_description: Highly suitable to showcase portfolio and group them nicely under filters. This plugin offers a portfolio widget with viewing options.

upgrade_notice.1.2.3: Update for wordpress new version. JS bug fixed.
upgrade_notice.1.2.2: Introduced options for the Portfolio link to open in new tab/same tab.
upgrade_notice.1.2.1: Bug fixes are there. Updated to work with latest wordpress version of 4.3.1
upgrade_notice.1.2.0: We have introduced new column settings in this upgrade. Also you can turn on/off the category filters. Please find out all the excited features.
upgrade_notice.1.1.1: We have updated the popup problem reported by our respected users.
upgrade_notice.1.1: We have updated the javascript files which were colliding with some of the theme files. The default portfolio design has been modified to work independent of any theme.

screenshots.caption: Add new portfolio. Add title, description, featured image, extra information, select category and click publish.
Add shortcode or php function to active the plugin.
Portfolio widget form. Add title, description and select number to show portfilos.
